description: A waterproof down filled jacket built with a taped Pertex® Shield outer and filled with recycled 700FP down. Warm and windproof this jacket will withstand cold, rough weather with boxwall construction for optimised down lofting and insulation.
name: Rab Valiance Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 700FP Recycled Down with Nikwax Fluorocarbon-Free Hydrophobic Finish (205g
